column5: Best Beachfront view in Galveston! Top floor & center--this tastefully updated condo comfortably accommodates 4 guests in classic island style. Fall in love with the best of both worlds--enjoy the sparkling pool & hot tubs with gorgeous coastal breezes and picturesque ocean views or walk onto the beach to collect sea glass & shells to your heart's content. Beachfront Hideaway exudes Island Time with a laid back casual atmosphere directly on the beach. Close to restaurants and shopping, but, secluded enough to unplug from the stressors of life and enjoy a sunrise meditation on your private balcony with unobstructed ocean views.
